en.goal_meta_national_link_text: Metadata on the presented time series
en.indicator_name: Proportion of countries where the legal framework (including customary law) guarantees women’s equal rights to land ownership and/or control
en.target_name: Undertake reforms to give women equal rights to economic resources, as well as access to ownership and control over land and other forms of property, financial services, inheritance and natural resources, in accordance with national laws
en.un_designated_tier: Tier II
en.un_custodian_agency: Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations (FAO)
en.page_content:
In progress
A suitable data source has been identified. The corresponding time series are currently being processed to be included in this reporting platform.
